scripts.dev:docker: npm run docker:up && npm run dev
scripts.prisma: npm run prisma-schema && npm run prisma-types && npm run prisma-seed
scripts.prismaa: npm run prisma-schema && npm run prisma-types && npm run prisma-seed && npm run prisma-studio
scripts.prisma:prod: npm run prisma-schema:prod && npm run prisma-types:prod && npm run prisma-seed:prod
scripts.prisma:reset-prod: npm run prereset:prod && npm run prisma-reset:prod && npm run prisma-schema:prod && npm run prisma-types:prod && npm run prisma-seed:prod
scripts.docker:psql: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U postgres -d raul_gym_fitness

scriptsInfo.docker:up: Start PostgreSQL database in Docker container (idempotent, safe to run multiple times)
scriptsInfo.docker:down: Stop and remove PostgreSQL Docker container, frees port 5432
scriptsInfo.docker:logs: View PostgreSQL container logs in real-time for debugging
scriptsInfo.docker:psql: Access PostgreSQL CLI directly for interactive SQL queries
scriptsInfo.docker:reset: ⚠️ NUCLEAR: Completely reset database (removes all data and volumes)
scriptsInfo.dev: Start development server with auto-starting Docker database on port 3000
scriptsInfo.dev:docker: Start database and development server together
scriptsInfo.devp: Kill existing Next.js dev process and restart
scriptsInfo.predev: Pre-hook: Validate development environment variables before dev starts
scriptsInfo.ngrok: Start ngrok tunnel on port 3000 for external access
scriptsInfo.ngrok-dev: Run dev server and ngrok in parallel
scriptsInfo.prebuild: Pre-hook: Validate production environment variables before build
scriptsInfo.lint: Run ESLint to check code quality
scriptsInfo.lint-fix: Run ESLint and automatically fix issues
scriptsInfo.type: Run TypeScript type checker without emitting files
scriptsInfo.test:ai: Run tests in AI mode (inline output, max 1 failure) for AI testing workflow
scriptsInfo.test:fix: Run tests with max 1 failure and single worker for debugging
scriptsInfo.test:ui: Run Playwright tests with interactive UI mode
scriptsInfo.test:headed: Run tests in headed mode (visible browser)
scriptsInfo.test:debug: Run tests in debug mode with Playwright inspector
scriptsInfo.prisma: Full workflow: push schema, generate types, and seed database
scriptsInfo.prismaa: Full workflow plus open Prisma Studio for visual database browser
scriptsInfo.prisma-schema: Push Prisma schema changes to development database
scriptsInfo.prisma-types: Generate Prisma Client types from schema
scriptsInfo.prisma-seed: Seed development database with initial data
scriptsInfo.prisma-studio: Open Prisma Studio GUI for development database
scriptsInfo.prisma:prod: Full production workflow: push schema, generate types, and seed
scriptsInfo.prisma-schema:prod: Push Prisma schema changes to production database
scriptsInfo.prisma-types:prod: Generate Prisma Client types for production
scriptsInfo.prisma-seed:prod: Seed production database with initial data
scriptsInfo.prisma-studio:prod: Open Prisma Studio GUI for production database
scriptsInfo.prereset:prod: Pre-hook: Check production env before reset
scriptsInfo.prisma-reset:prod: ⚠️ DANGEROUS: Force reset production database (data loss)
scriptsInfo.prisma:reset-prod: ⚠️ NUCLEAR: Full production reset workflow (validates, resets, rebuilds)
scriptsInfo.postinstall: Post-install hook: Generate Prisma Client after npm install
